reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson's lectures are engaging and informative. Her passion for biology is contagious!

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Prof. Smith knows his subject well, but can sometimes be unclear in explanations.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Absolutely brilliant! Dr. Lee makes complex concepts easy to understand and applies them to real-life situations.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Prof. Brown's enthusiasm for history is evident. His classes are always interesting and thought-provoking.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Taylor's course is challenging, and her grading can be harsh. More office hours would be helpful.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Prof. Wilson's deep knowledge and passion for literature make every class a joy to attend.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Dr. Chen is great at explaining complex programming concepts. Her projects are challenging but rewarding.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Prof. Anderson's lectures can be dry, but he's always willing to help during office hours.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Garcia's classes are eye-opening. She encourages critical thinking and lively discussions.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Prof. White brings real-world examples into his lectures, making economic theories more accessible.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. Mitchell's passion for art is infectious. Her lectures are like guided tours through time.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Prof. Lee knows his subject well, but can sometimes get sidetracked during lectures.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Dr. Turner's fieldwork experiences add a unique perspective to her engaging lectures.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Prof. Harris challenges students to think deeply. His Socratic method is both frustrating and rewarding.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Foster's passion for the environment is clear. Her field trips are the highlight of the course.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Prof. Kim is knowledgeable but his pacing can be too fast at times. Extra practice problems would be helpful.

reviews.subject: Neuroscience
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez makes neuroscience fascinating. Her lectures are clear, and her enthusiasm is contagious.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Prof. Thompson's practical approach to music theory is refreshing. His classes are both fun and informative.

reviews.subject: Genetics
reviews.review: Dr. Green's course is challenging but fair. More interactive elements in class would be beneficial.

reviews.subject: Business Ethics
reviews.review: Prof. Clark brings interesting case studies to class, promoting thoughtful discussions on ethical dilemmas.
